title: I can't update to the new League of Legends Client. Help?
body:
I have linked a video to the problem at hand. If anyone can give me any feedback that would be much appreciated :D

_-btw i'm a montage/video editor for anyone who might be looking for something along those lines ;)-_

replies.body:
You turned your pain into music, and I don't know how to feel.  Allow me to add some harmony to your hot riffs by suggesting the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  Some setting from your OS or  software might be blocking the client from launching, so nothing is showing up.  Make sure to give your pc a solid restart too, to make sure nothing crashed in the background.  If this helps, I recommend a recorder piece in your montage.  :P

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GI_P3UtZXAA
